title: Lens
description: A handmade chapbook featuring one new four-page poem by John Burroughs (a.k.a. Jesus Crisis) published to celebrate the Nia Coffeehouse event "Poems of Power, Words of Life" at St. Alban Episcopal Church, 3555 Euclid Heights Blvd. in Cleveland Heights on 3/27/2012 from 6 to 9 p.m. Limited edition of 30 copies. http://www.facebook.com/events/340073...
author: John  Burroughs
